name: Moonpiercer (In Effect)
description: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice the next time the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a Talent card during this Round.
descriptionraw: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice <color=#FFFFFFFF>the next time the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card during this Round.</color>
descriptionreplaced: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice <color=#FFFFFFFF>the next time the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card during this Round.</color>
